Reviews.Title: stay away
Reviews.Author: js
Reviews.Content: stay away from Toshiba computers,toshiba will not honor their warranty! my computer is six weeks old and it had a problem with the bios, needed a password, Toshiba said its not covered under warranty that I would have to pay to get the password reset.

Reviews.Title: Great specs and speed, lousy speakers
Reviews.Author: Robert R. Hults
Reviews.Content: I bought this model 6 weeks ago due to price, specs and previous good experience with Toshiba.  This laptop is fast and screen is nice.  Speakers are just awful.  I don't expect concert hall quality, of course, but these are tinny and very poor.  Toshiba Customer service suggests getting external speakers.  I think they should be embarrassed to recommend that solution.This our family's third and LAST Toshiba laptop.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with laptop and Toshiba customer service.
Reviews.Author: Deanna Decker
Reviews.Content: I am very upset with this product and Toshiba customer service. Problems started with a few keys not working and the F key seemingly stuck and progressed to no keys working whatsoever. Toshiba wants $10.55 and $60 labor to repair something that is covered under warranty. I asked for the laptop to be returned to me and I will have someone local repair it. I have a Samsung laptop that has given me no problems at all and I'll be going with Samsung in the future.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel® CoreTM i3-2328M Processor @ 2.2 GHz / 8GB DDR3 Memory / 500GB HDD (5400rpm, Serial ATA)
15.6" widescreen HD TruBrite® LED Backlit display (Resolution: 1366x768 (HD), 16:9 aspect ratio, Supports 720p content) /  Plays and burns CDs and DVDs /
Built-in webcam and microphone / Memory card reader / 1 USB 3.0; 2 USB 2.0; 1 Ethernet; 1 HDMI; 1 VGA 15-pin D-sub
Wi-Fi® Wireless networking (802.11b/g/n) / Built-in microphone, Headphone jack (stereo), Standard stereo speakers, TOSHIBA Audio Enhancement
Microsoft® Windows® 8 / Fusion® Finish in Mercury Silver / Energy Star Qualified
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite® C855-S5355 Laptop with 15.6" Screen - 2nd Gen Intel® CoreTM i3 Processor - 8GB Memory - 500GB Hard Drive - Windows 8
